title: Regulation Act, 2001 (No. 1 of 2001), hereby makes the following regulations:
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Transport (Tour Operators and
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Transport (Tour Operators and 

Travel Agents) Act, 1982, (Disbursements from Fund) Regulations, 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited transport (tour operator travel agents) act 1982 (disbursements fund) regulation 2022

title: Regulation Act, 2001 (No. 1 of 2001), hereby makes the following regulations:
heading: In these Regulations, “the Regulations of 2021” mean the Transport
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “the Regulations of 2021” mean the Transport 
(Tour Operators and Travel Agents) Act, 1982, (Disbursements from Fund) 
Regulations, 2021, S.I. 105 of 2021.
text_norm: 2 regulation regulation 2021 mean transport (tour operator travel agents) act 1982 (disbursements fund) regulation 2021 s.i 105 2021

title: Regulation Act, 2001 (No. 1 of 2001), hereby makes the following regulations:
heading: 3. Regulation 3 of the Regulations of 2021 is amended by the substitution
text_raw:
3. Regulation 3 of the Regulations of 2021 is amended by the substitution 

of the following Regulation for Regulation 3 

“3(i). Payments from the Fund may be made to a customer who holds a 
refund credit note where the tour operator or travel agent who issued the 
refund credit note is unable or fails to meet the financial or contractual 
obligations owed to the customer by the tour operator or travel agent 
pursuant to the refund credit note concerned. 

(ii)No Refund Credit Note shall be issued by a tour operator or travel 
agent after 31 December 2022. 

(iii) No payments from the Fund may be made to a customer who holds a 
Refund Credit Note after 31 December 2024.”
text_norm: 3 regulation 3 regulation 2021 amended substitution following regulation regulation 3 3(i) payment fund may made customer hold refund credit note tour operator travel agent issued refund credit note unable fails meet financial contractual obligation owed customer tour operator travel agent pursuant refund credit note concerned (ii)no refund credit note shall issued tour operator travel agent 31 december 2022 (iii) payment fund may made customer hold refund credit note 31 december 2024

title: Regulation Act, 2001 (No. 1 of 2001), hereby makes the following regulations:
heading: 4. Regulation 4 of the Regulations of 2021 is amended by the substitution
text_raw:
4. Regulation 4 of the Regulations of 2021 is amended by the substitution 

of the following Regulation for Regulation 4 

“4(i). A refund credit note issued before 31 December 2022 is not a 
voucher, trading stamp or token within the meaning of Regulation 15 of 
the Transport (Tour Operators and Travel Agents) Act, 1982 (Claims by 
Customers) Regulations, 1983 (S.I. No.104 of 1983) and the said 
Regulation 15 shall not apply to a refund credit note. 

(ii) A refund credit note issued after 31 December 2022 shall be regarded 
as a voucher, trading stamp or token within the meaning of Regulation 15 
of the Transport (Tour Operators and Travel Agents) Act, 1982 (Claims 
by Customers) Regulations, 1983 (S.I. No.104 of 1983) and the said 
Regulation 15 shall apply to a refund credit note.” 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [644] 3 

GIVEN under the seal of the Commission for Aviation 
Regulation, 

9 December, 2022. 

DAVID HODNETT, 

Deputy Commissioner.
